summary: A job marketplace/worker app where workers can apply for jobs. Adding a simplified job application flow, and a 'no available jobs' state that encourages workers to join and sign up for job alerts when no jobs are currently available.

existing_features.title: Simplify the job application process on the Job Board page so workers can apply to a job with minimal steps — reduce the multi-step application dialog to a single-click or single-step confirmation (e.g., one 'Apply Now' button with a brief confirmation prompt), removing unnecessary intermediate steps while still recording the application in the backend.

When there are no available/open jobs on the Job Board (empty state), display a prominent 'Join Us' panel that encourages workers to sign up for job alerts. The panel should include a friendly message such as 'No jobs available right now — Join our worker network and we'll alert you when new jobs are posted!', a 'Join Us' call-to-action button, and a secondary note reassuring workers that they'll be notified when jobs become available.

Wire the 'Join Us' button on the Job Board empty-state panel to call the backend job alert subscription function. After a successful subscription, display a success message such as 'You're on the list! We'll alert you when new jobs are posted.' and disable or update the button to prevent duplicate submissions.

new_feature_requests.summary: Simplified/easy job application method for workers
When no jobs are available, show a 'Join Us' prompt encouraging workers to sign up and receive job alerts/notifications

Add a backend 'job alert subscription' capability: store a worker's interest/subscription intent when they click 'Join Us' on the empty-state panel. Record the worker's principal and a timestamp so that administrators can later view subscribed workers waiting for job alerts.
